Pricing.title: MemFree Pricing
Pricing.Free1: Up to 10 Basic AI Searches per day
Pricing.Free2: Up to 10 bookmarks and web pages to index
Pricing.Free3: Up to 1024 tokens output per answer
Pricing.Free4: Up to 4MB For Single File and Image to Ask
Pricing.Pro1: Unlimited Basic AI Searches Per Month
Pricing.Pro2: Up to 1000 Expert AI Searches Per Month
Pricing.Pro3: Up to 1000 Bookmarks and Web Pages to Index
Pricing.Pro4: Up to 4096 tokens output per answer
Pricing.Pro5: Up to 20MB For Single File and Image to Ask
Pricing.Pro9: Support Rerank to get better search results
Pricing.Premium1: Unlimited Basic AI Searches Per Month
Pricing.Premium2: Unlimited Expert AI Searches Per Month
Pricing.Premium3: Unlimited Bookmarks and Web Pages to Index
Pricing.Premium5: Up to 50MB For Single File and Image to Ask
Pricing.Premium6: Up to 16384 tokens output Per Answer
Pricing.upgrade-call: Unlock Advanced Features With MemFree Pro

PricingFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
PricingFAQ.answer1: Memfree is a hybrid AI search engine that simultaneously retrieves the most relevant information from both your personal knowledge base and the Internet, then let the AI model to provide the best possible answer.
PricingFAQ.question2: What is the meaning is Index?
PricingFAQ.answer2: Memfree collects and stores your bookmarks, web pages, and local files using AI indexing. This enables you to quickly search for and retrieve the most relevant content and provide the best possible answer, Your index file is private and accessible only to you.
PricingFAQ.answer3: Memfree charges a monthly fee because the AI services, search services, and vector indexing services we utilize require continuous monthly payments
PricingFAQ.answer4: If you experience any issues with payment or subscription, please contact us via email at support@memfree.me or through feedback.memfree.me
